titleStmt.title: The distracted state, a tragedy. / Written in the yeer, 1641. By J.T. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Tatham, John, fl. 1632-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.H. for Iohn Tey, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the White Lion in the Strand, neer the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: With a dedication to Sir John Sidley. Variant: dedication is to Sir William Sidley.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nov: 29"; the date has been crossed out and replaced with "1650".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
